overview: What makes younger guys love older women and older women want younger men? We have got the answer, as these six hot Cougars reveal how they aggressively seduce younger men to get what they want. Whether the Cougars are stalking their prey at a local sports club or gym or seducing a young next door neighbor or hitch hiker - the fur flies in a frenetic sexual frenzy! Cubs beware - these Cougars are experienced, primed and ready to fuck!
title: Cougars and Cubs
